Text: so tried something new with this upload...I kept the scanner tags on them. Give me some feedback on if you are for or against this. Hope you seed the crap out of this one. and make sure and leave feedback and say thanks or else...

Of course we are for you keeping scanners tags. Scanning takes time and without people buying, scanning & editing these comics we wouldn't have them for free. You should never remove the tags when sharing.

You're taking the time to compile them, you label them however the hell you want.  :-)

Know that your time and efforts are appreciated!

And I like this format... you posting all the #1's, #2's, etc.
So he deserves credit for bunging some files in a folder, but the scanners don't deserve credit? Whatever dude.
come on people, put some comments on this torrent, don't let them win. every time you fail to comment, they win...
Thanks for bundling all of these together, major time saver.
